feature_description_1: Enjoy browser-based multi-user conferences without downloading any app.
feature_description_2: Share links and notes with our real-time chat feature on the go.
feature_description_3: Need to show something important during the conference? Share your screen instantly.
feature_description_4: Now you can share any media file of your choice on the go during video conferences.
feature_description_5: Use the collaborative whiteboard to share your ideas. Draw, write & download as an image.
feature_description_6: Easily record the meeting along with the screen and whiteboard, directly into your device.
feature_description_7: Choose which device and video quality work best for you before and after joining a meeting.
feature_description_8: The video meetings are end-to-end encrypted so that you can relax and enjoy the meeting.
Once you are logged into the system, nav: Once you are logged into the system, navigate to the dashboard and create a new meeting. Then, click and the Start link and Join the meeting. When the browser prompts for media permission, then approve it. You should be inside the video meeting now.
Invite someone by clicking on the share: Invite someone by clicking on the share icon. When they enter the same meeting ID as yours, you both will be connected. Enjoy rich features such as chat, screen sharing, file sharing, etc.
What are you waiting for? Host a meeting: What are you waiting for? Host a meeting now.
About The Site Description: The application provides the ability to host video meetings without downloading any apps into your machine. Enjoy fast, secure, and high-definition video meetings with rich features such as chat, file sharing, screen sharing, and many more.
faq_q1: How secure is the video meeting?
faq_q2: How do I invite people to the meeting?
faq_q3: The browser is not asking for the media permission, what do I do?
faq_q4: I can not see the other person, why?
faq_a1: The meetings are end-to-end encrypted. In addition, the host can set a meeting password, can decide who joins the meeting, and can kick participants out of the meeting. Which makes the meeting very secure.
faq_a2: You can send the meeting invite email from the dashboard or once you join the meeting, you can share the link in just one click from the meeting option buttons.
faq_a3: Make sure you have the media device attached and the browser is not blocked by your device settings. The best way is to test your media device online.
faq_a4: Make sure you both are in the same meeting. If you are the host, check the dialog in the upper right corner where you can accept the participant's request.
The application is the best way to host: The application is the best way to host video meetings online. The easy-to-use features make it more convenient to use this application for users. Try hosting a meeting now, you will get to know how easy to use the features are.
You can share the screen once someone jo: You can share the screen once someone joins the meeting.
